Work Contact

Sun Life

Connecting clients and prospects with an advisor through a range of digital initiatives.

As the Digital Creative Designer at Sun Life, I focused on crafting marketing campaigns aimed at connecting clients and prospects with advisors. Working in an agile team, I partnered closely with marketing managers and copywriters to deliver a diverse range of digital assets. These included social media content, email campaigns, landing pages, and programmatic advertisements. All designs are produced with their corresponding French equivalents, and occasionally, adapted for additional languages to ensure broader accessibility and reach.
